resources.string: Tambarin mai daukan nauyi; latsa domin ziyartar shafin mai daukan nauyi
Buɗe Browser
idan kana da sharhu na musamman,kokuma kana neman ƙarin bayani akan shafukan yanar gizo da basa aiki, kokuma idan wannan shafin ne bayayi maka aiki, za a iya turo da saƙon imel feedback@psiphon.ca.
mun gode daka maryanin ka
ba\'ayi nasarar miƙawa ba. a sake gwadawa
VPN din Psiphon ya tsaya
ko dai ka katse VPN din Psiphon kokuma wata manhajar ta katse ta. Manhajoji masu amfani da VPN basa iya aiki tare a lokaci daya. sake dubawa ko ɗora wata manhajar mai amfani da VPN kuma yana kan aiki
VON din Psiphon bazai iya fara aiki ba
Psiphon bazai iya fara aiki da VON ba. Manhajoji masu amfani da VPN bazasu iya aiki tare lokaci ɗaya ba. Duba ko wani manhajar mai amfani da VPN na a kunne kuma yana kai aiki a koda yaushe
babu yankin da aka zaɓa, a sake zaɓar wani yankin.

a wannan tsarin, a buƙatar a zaɓi koda manhaja daya ne
a wannan tsarin, ana bukatar a rage yawan manhajar da aka zaɓa, koda guda ɗaya ne

Manhaja mai haɗari ga Psiphon
ana samun ƙaruwar hari masu haɗari! latsa domin ƙarin bayani.
Manhaja mai haɗari ga Psiphon
Psiphon ya gano kuma ya dakatar da shiga wani waje mai tattare da hatsari. Latsa nan domin ƙarin bayani more.\n\nDetected:
Manhaja mai haɗari ga Psiphon
A take Psiphon ke ganewa kuma ya hana shiga shafuka masu hatsari ?\n\nZa a iya canza wannan saitin daga baya a More Options.
a samu ƙarin bayani akan Manhaja mai hatsari nan:
akwai matsala a wilin Upstream
Buɗe Psiphon ka duba yanayin saitin proxy
an samu tangarɗa a wakili

Ka shirya Psiphon akan tsarin da zaiyi amfani da wakili na Upstream. Amma bamu samu nasarar haɗa Psiphon da babbar ma\'ajiya ta hanyar wakilin ba. A daure a sake canza saitin kafin a sake gwadawa. \n\nLatsa domin ƙarin bayani
Psiphon ya tsaya
a turo mana martani
latsa wannan sanarwar domin maido mana martani. wannan zai taimaka mana wajen fahimtar matsalar domin gyarawa
na amince
yanda ake sarrafa bayanan da aka tattara
%s na amfani da VPN din Android domin samar maka da bayanan da basu da adadi a yanar gizo. Muna tattara da kuma adana bayanai da suka haɗa da:
Adreshin imel wanda ka turo mana matsalolin da ake fuskanta. Bada wannan adreshin, ba dole bane
Sunnan asusunka na PsiCash, kalmar sirri, da imel. Amma adreshin imel ba dole bane.
%s sanarwa
%s na amfani da sanarwar kar-ta-kwana don gabatar maka da muhimman bayanai lokacin da ake rufe shafin manhajar. Wannan ya haɗar da:
An samu canji a yanayin VPN dinka
akwai matsala a yanayin sadarwa
rahoto akan tsayawa
Gargadi akan manhaja mai hatsari
an samu sabuwa kuma ingantacciyar manhaja
Za a iya dakatar da saƙonin kar-ta-kwana na wannan manhajar a duk lokacin da ake buƙar yin hakan.
a dan tsahirta, Psiphon na shirin buɗewa
Rufewa
Rufewa
kana son rufe wannan shafin yanzu?
Muna godiya
a cikin saiti, a latsa NFC
Ba\'a samu nasarar sadarwa tsakanin na\'urori ba. A daure a tabbatar Psiphon na a buɗe kuma a jone da sauran na\'urori, sannan a dake gwadawa
Ana jiran NFC ya haɗu da wata na\'ura...
An yi nasarar musayar bayanai!
Ba\'a samu nasarar haɗewa da wata na\'ura ba. A sake gwadawa.
An yi hanzarin motsar da na\'ura kuma sadarwar ta katse. A sake gwadawa.
An gano tambarin da ba\'a yarda dashi ba. A buɗe Psiphon take kuma a haɗe da wata na\'ura?
karanta bayanai…
Nemi taimako domin haɗewa
taimako
tsallake
nagaba
An gama
Idan kana samun matsala wajen haɗa uwar garken Psiphon, nemi wani makusancin da yayi nasarar hakan domin amfani da bayanan da sukayi amfani dashi ta hanyar amfani da NFC don samun nasar sadarwa.
Tabbatar da Psiphon na buɗe kuma a haɗe, sannan ya kasance ana ganin alamun Bump din Psiphon ya fito a na\'ura da aka haɗa.
Yayin da Bump din Psiphon ya buɗe a na\'urar ka, kuma manhajar Psiphon ta buɗe, ta haɗe da wata na\'ura, sai a haɗe bayan na\'urorin biyu domin a samu damar tura bayanai.
Da zarar an yi nasarar masanyar bayanai kuma Psiphon ta yi nasarar haɗewa, Bump din Psiphon zai kashe kanshi da kanshi. Idan ana samun tangarɗa wajen haɗuwa, a cigaba da gwadawa har a dace.
Bump din Psiphon
BuɗebNFC a cikin saiti domin bada dama ga Bump din Psiphon
Buɗe saiti
